name: @instana/azure-app-service
description: Instana tracing and monitoring for Node.js based Azure

scripts.audit: bin/prepare-audit.sh && npm audit --production; AUDIT_RESULT=$?; git checkout package-lock.json; exit $AUDIT_RESULT
scripts.test:ci:
echo "******* Files to be tested:
 $CI_CORE_TEST_FILES" && if [ -z "${CI_CORE_TEST_FILES}" ]; then echo "No test files have been assigned to this CircleCI executor."; else mocha --reporter mocha-multi-reporters --reporter-options configFile=reporter-config.json --require test/hooks.js --sort ${CI_CORE_TEST_FILES}; fi
